video_prompt: A heavily armed, futuristic red train powers along an elevated track, its massive form dominating the frame. Headlamps and various smaller lights glow and pulse with blue and red energy. Fluffy white clouds drift across a vibrant blue sky as the train recedes into the curving distance, emphasizing its speed and scale. The camera dynamically tracks the colossal train as it moves, showcasing intricate mechanical detailing in an anime-style.
image_prompt: A colossal, heavily armed futuristic red train, rendered in a highly detailed anime/manga style from a low-angle perspective. The vibrant red locomotive has a blocky armored design, two prominent dark grey multi-barreled cannons on top, a dark rectangular windshield, circular headlamp, a white stylized 'E' emblem, and intricate mechanical detailing with glowing blue lights. It moves on an elevated dark industrial bridge with glowing red elements, under a bright blue sky filled with large, fluffy white clouds. Emphasize clean lines, bold cel-shaded colors, and monumental power.
refined_video_prompt: A train powers along an elevated track. Its lights glow and pulse with blue and red energy. Clouds drift across the sky. The train recedes into the curving distance, emphasizing its speed. The camera dynamically tracks the train's continuous movement.
